recipes.label: Reason Like a Scalpel
recipes.startdescription: Coda after coda, I weave an appeal with a poet's grace and a mathematical complexity, but throughout all a single glorious truth shines. We will almost certainly succeed.

recipes.label: Reason Like a Razor
recipes.startdescription: Arguments follow Arguments. One leads to the next, like the colors of the dawn dividing, until our truth is clear as day. We will likely succeed.

recipes.label: Reason Like a Knife
recipes.startdescription: Statements follow statements: My reasoning is build up like a light through a prism, one truth cast in many shades of logic and rhetoric. We may yet succeed.

recipes.label: Appeal To Their Core
recipes.startdescription: Be it constabulary, royalty, divinity, all hold certain secret values close to what passes for their hearts. I will play them like a musician plays their strings. We will almost certainly succeed.

recipes.label: Appeal To Their Needs
recipes.startdescription: Be it monsters, mages, Names, all beings high and low will have their goals to reach. Approach them as an equal and play them like a betting table. We will likely succeed.

recipes.label: Appeal To Their Wants
recipes.startdescription: Be it warriors, poets, princes, all men are not so different, regardless if they are from the wake or from the Manse. Find what they desire, and play them like a musicbox. We may yet succeed.
